Articles.Content:
Cheesy name aside, this is a great spacecraft. The MUN-Tech V1 is a recreation I made a few weeks ago to celebrate the anniversary of the first Moon landing, involving Buzz, Michael, and Neil going to the Moon, with Michael in the command capsule in Lunar orbit. -- Anyway! This is the MUN-Tech V1:

It is a Apollo Style, if that wasn't obvious from the text above, and it is a very easy starter Apollo craft. It uses accurate pieces such as the Launch Escape System at the top (Escape launch using abort button) and a return stage with the engine built into the tanks (No part clipping activated!) This is a short post, because what really matters is the craft file so that you, yes, you can enjoy using this craft. And that I am tired as hell. And I hadn't posted in a while soooÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ yeah.

Download Craft:

http://www./view/anxc72abbyds86v/MUN-Tech_V1.craft
